title: How to relate your life to the book called “The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn” - Quora

response.answer_text: The first thing to do is to read the book. As you read, pay special attention to any part of the book that you agree with, sympathize with, or relate to. Moments that make you think “yeah, I'd do that same thing" or “I know how that feels" or “that reminds me of a time I…” are the kind you're looking for. When you find a moment like these, write down the page number, highlight it, or put a sticky note on that page so you can find it again.
